body:
This PR improves `llnl.util.lang.load_module_from_file` in the following ways:
- [x] Put a module object in `sys.modules` before the code of the module is executed to avoid unbounded recursion or reloading.
- [x] Exit early if the module to be constructed is already in `sys.modules`
- [x] Improve test by ensuring that multiple calls to the function will not reload the same module multiple times
title: Improve llnl.util.lang.load_module_from_file
